changelog.title: Perl Module Image::Size Change History
changelog.description: Image::Size is a simple library that allows the fetching of image size information from files in a wide variety of common (and not-so-common) formats.

change.description: Add support for old OS/2 version of BMP header (Geoff Richards).
Typo fixes (David Steinbrunner).

Avoid a sprintf() warning in Perl 5.21. Perl 5.21 introduces a warning for redundant arguments to s?printf(), so sprintf("%d", 1, 2) would warn. This commit silences that warning by passing sprintf the exact number of arguments that it expects (Brian Fraser).
Added =encoding utf8 to pod - the accented character was causing a pod error (Neil Bowers).
Added Z<> to the =item [012] to resolve pod warning. You can't have =item 0, so the way round this seems to be to add a Z<> (zero width space) before each digit (Neil Bowers).
Added link to github repo to doc (Neil Bowers).
RT #41238: Applied modified version of patch from user to fix a die problem with unpack on truncated files.
Add support for WEBP, ICO and CUR file types (Baldur Kristinsson).
Fix some perlcritic issues.
Removed the "!" flag in pack template for EMF. It was not needed and it broke on earlier Perls.
Small change to swfmxsize for short-buffer issues.

Multiple changes in this commit: Abandoned AutoLoader; moved POD to the end of the file now that all the per-format subroutines are part of the file-proper; fixed cases where lack of ImageMagick would cause the error message to be overwritten.
New test (and image) for JPG tag-offset issue.
Applied patch from github user kazeburo: bug fix for some jpeg files
Fixed so that default output now catches errors. Previously, you would get an "undefined" warning if there was an error in parsing/sizing the input file.
Turns out the 4 bounding-box ints for EMF are signed.
perlcritic clean-ups from new rules.
RT #59995: Added support for Windows Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF).
Move the author/distro-sanity tests to an "xt" directory.
Large-scale code and documentation clean-up based on perlcritic and visual review.
Small fix to the regex for detecting GIFs, per Slaven Rezic.
Removed a stray colon causing errors with some Perl versions.
Removed useless signature test, added QA tests, removed a duplicate test.
Moved around some conditionally-needed libs to delay loading until/unless needed. Also made a small fix per Perl::Critic.

Make the package buildable in a pure-Perl software stack. Per RT ticket #42930, make Compress::Zlib optional, so that those who do not need it are not required to install it. Updated the test around the compressed-SWF file to skip if Compress::Zlib is absent.

Making large-scale house-keeping changes to the build/dist process. Replace ChangeLog (plain-text) with a ChangeLogML file created from the CVS/SVN history and hand-adjusted; add the XSD for ChangeLogML; restore Build.PL and heavily enhance; and remove README.Win32, Makefile.PL and MANIFEST.

Per RT ticket #43452, make the cache visible outside the lexical scope of the module This allows the hash to be used with packages like IPC::Shareable or IPC::MM to enable sharing the cache between processes. Added extra documentation of this, and a new section describing approaches to cache-sharing.

This patch also adds a new test suite, t/magick.t, to the distribution and modifies both MANIFEST and Makefile.PL (to add a build-dependancy on Test::More).
With Test::More now required for building, converted t/all.t to use it.

change.author: rjray
change.description: Worked on the regular expressions that are used on the text-based formats, in hopes of further smoothing out the rift between UNIX and non-UNIX systems. Added use of Cwd. Filenames passed in are prepended with the current dir if they aren't already absolute pathnames. This was to fix a subtle problem where different files with the same relative names (referenced from different directories) would confuse the cache. Added the image type to the cached data. Previously, only dimensions were cached. Now, a cache-hit returns the same triple returned originally. Also added the file's modification-time to the cache, as the (growing!) use of Image::Size in Apache mod_perl environments found that if an image is changed, the cache won't notice. Now it does. Added recognition of thumbnail-format pics from the popular viewer XV. The value of image type for these is the string "XV". Integrated a patch that makes html_imgsize generate tags that are XHTML- compliant. Same patch also caught a few doc bugs that I'd missed.
